System.Name: Skeleton system
System.Funtion: Forms a protective model to protect the muscles.

System.Name: Digestive system
System.Funtion: Breaks down the chenical components of food.
System.Parts: 1. Mouth 2. Throat 3. Stomach 4. Intestines 5. rectum 6. Anus

System.Name: Nuscular system
System.Funtion: Moves the muscles by tension and contraction.

System.Name: Nervous system
System.Funtion: Gathers infornation and controlls the overall human system.
